Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2009 04:01AM katsmeow wrote: I don't remember them using the wire for my lumpectomy.  As for as tissue goes, your surgeon is correct on stating they don't know how much they will remove.  I would ask again at the time of your lumpectomy or call them and ask again what their initial intention is or how they plan on judging.   Tell them you would like to know what would happen if what they find is larger then they originally thought.  There should be no surprises when you wake up.  Always feel free to call them and ask questions, that is what they are paid to do.
